FightPet_1.name: Kalka
FightPet_1.description: An early smart servant model developed by Dr. Claire of Cetus Island. A new smart servant combat module has been tested for it in response to new combat requirements.

skills.name: Kalka Impact
skills.description: Kalka rushes forward, dealing damage equal to **765% / 1147% / 1147%** of ATK to targets ahead and increases its own ATK by **10%** for 8 seconds.

skills.name: Kalka Laser
skills.description: Kalka begins charging up, then releases a concentrated laser blast ahead, dealing damage equal to **1613% / 1613% / 1613%** of ATK to targets ahead and restores its master's HP equal to **1613% / 1613% / 1613%** of their ATK.

skills.name: Kalka Fist
skills.description: Kalka punches forward with its left and right fists in succession, dealing 2 hits to enemies ahead, each hit dealing damage equal to **496% / 496% / 744%** of ATK.

FightPet_1.properties:
Inherits **4%** of the average value of the master's flame, frost, volt, and physical base attack values.
**1** module slot and **5** load.
advancements:
ATK inheritance increases to **6%**.
Kalka Impact's damage increases to **1,147%**.
**2** module slots and **8** load.

ATK inheritance increases to **8%**.
Each round of Kalka Fist's damage increases to **744%**.
**3** module slots and **11** load.

ATK inheritance increases to **10%**.
Kalka Laser's damage increases to **2,420%** and HP recovery increases to **140%** of ATK.
**4** module slots and **15** load.

material.name: Zhuyan Scale Mail
material.description: The patterns on the scale mail make it obvious that it was no ordinary civilization behind its creation.

material.name: Graystone
material.description: A peculiar ore from Domain 9. An essential material used in the production of certain alloy devices.

material.name: Ginger Essence
material.description: A crystal formed through energy leaking to the surface from leylines. Easily affected by the environment, these produce a lattice that reflects more yellow light, from whence it gets its name. It is a high-energy source.

material.name: Black Crow's Feather
material.description: The whistling from it cutting through the wind seems audible as you gaze upon it.

material.name: Taotie Essence Pellet
material.description: The attached energy body is said to have formed from the residual energy of the eaten organism.

material.name: Red Ore
material.description: A peculiar ore from Domain 9. Its bright crimson hue is eerily reminiscent of blood.

material.name: Sky Crystal
material.description: A peculiar ore from Domain 9. Its crystal-clear appearance sparkles brightly in the sunlight.

material.name: Umbra Rock
material.description: A peculiar ore from Domain 9. Its unusual texture grants it a strange color.

material.name: Standard Lamellar Armor
material.description: A small, standard-style lamellar armor that offers pretty good defensive performance.

material.name: Dark Essence
material.description: A crystal formed on the surface from leaking leyline energy. Affected by the environment, it produces a lattice that tends to reflect more purple light, from whence it gets its name. It is a low-energy source.

material.name: Weapon License
material.description: A key system that grants permission to use weapons.

FightPet_2.name: Void Angel
FightPet_2.description: A multi-purpose smart servant from the Old Federation days that can be used in a variety of situations. A new smart servant combat module has been tested for it in response to new combat requirements.

skills.name: Firebomb
skills.description: Void Angel raises its right arm, launching 4 Firebombs at enemies. Each Firebomb deals damage equal to **413% / 413% / 413%** of ATK to hit enemies.

skills.name: Flame Jet
skills.description: Void Angel raises both its arms, spewing out jets of flame, dealing 4 rounds of flame attacks to enemies ahead, each hit dealing damage equal to **78% / 118% / 118%** of ATK and additionally burning the enemies for damage equal to **78% / 118% / 118%** of ATK for 5 seconds. While being burned, the targets' outgoing healing is reduced by 50%.

skills.name: Angel's Wrath
skills.description: Void Angel lifts both arms, creating a ball of flame above its head, then smashes it toward enemies ahead, dealing damage equal to **600% / 600% / 901%** of ATK to hit enemies.

FightPet_2.properties:
Inherits **4%** of the average value of the master's flame, frost, volt, and physical base attack values.
**1** module slot and **5** load.
advancements:
ATK inheritance increases to **6%**.
Each round of Flame Jet's damage increases to **118%**, and each round of burn damage increases to **90%**.
**2** module slots and **8** load.

ATK inheritance increases to **8%**.
Angel's Wrath's damage increases to **901%**.
**3** module slots and **11** load.

ATK inheritance increases to **10%**.
Each round of Firebomb's damage increases to **619%**.
**4** module slots and **15** load.

FightPet_3.name: Angela
FightPet_3.description: A smart servant from the Old Federation days originally intended for use as an entertainment performer. A new smart servant combat module has been tested for it in response to new combat requirements.

skills.name: Frozen Burst
skills.description: Angela raises both arms, creating a burst of ice at the enemies' location, dealing damage equal to **987% / 987% / 1481%** of ATK to hit enemies and causing them to become Frostbitten for 6 seconds.

skills.name: Angela Loves You!
skills.description: Angela lifts both arms, creating an ice ball above its head, then smashes it toward enemies ahead, dealing damage equal to **1112% / 1112% / 1112%** of ATK to hit enemies and causing them to become Frostbitten for 6 seconds.

skills.name: Angela's Flying Kick
skills.description: Angela flies up a distance, then swoops down with a flying kick, dealing damage equal to **1068% / 1602% / 1602%** of ATK to enemies in its path.

FightPet_3.properties:
Inherits **4%** of the average value of the master's flame, frost, volt, and physical base attack values.
**1** module slot and **5** load.
advancements:
ATK inheritance increases to **6%**.
Angela's Flying Kick's damage increases to **1,602%**.
**2** module slots and **8** load.

ATK inheritance increases to **8%**.
Frozen Burst's damage increases to **1,481%**.
**3** module slots and **11** load.

ATK inheritance increases to **10%**.
Angela Loves You!'s damage increases to **1,668%**.
**4** module slots and **15** load.

FightPet_4.name: Moonrabbit
FightPet_4.description: A mechanical assistant smart servant developed by Banges Tech. A new smart servant combat module has been tested for it in response to new combat requirements.

skills.name: Moonrabbit Flurry
skills.description: Moonrabbit begins spinning and rushes forward, using its electrified arms to deal 6 rounds of volt attacks to nearby enemies, each hit dealing damage equal to **163% / 244% / 244%** of ATK.

skills.name: Moonrabbit Shot
skills.description: Moonrabbit fires large electric projectiles from its arms, dealing 3 rounds of volt attacks to enemies ahead, each hit dealing damage equal to **382% / 382% / 573%** of ATK and granting its master a shield equal to **382% / 382% / 573%** of their ATK for 5 seconds.

skills.name: Furious Rage
skills.description: Moonrabbit brings thunder and lightning down around itself, dealing 6 rounds of volt attacks to surrounding enemies, each hit dealing damage equal to **348% / 348% / 348%** of ATK.

FightPet_4.properties:
Inherits **4%** of the average value of the master's flame, frost, volt, and physical base attack values.
**1** module slot and **5** load.
advancements:
ATK inheritance increases to **6%**.
Each round of Moonrabbit Flurry's damage increases to **244%**.
**2** module slots and **8** load.

ATK inheritance increases to **8%**.
Each round of Moonrabbit Shot's damage increases to **573%**, and HP shield increases to **120%** of ATK.
**3** module slots and **11** load.

ATK inheritance increases to **10%**.
Each round of Furious Rage's damage increases to **522%**.
**4** module slots and **15** load.

FightPet_5.name: Flame Sparrow
FightPet_5.description: A next-generation smart servant developed by Ling Qiao, based on the local Flaming Finch. Its combat module has been tested for it in response to new combat requirements.

skills.name: Flame Breath
skills.description: Flame Sparrow breathes fire at the enemy 3 times, dealing damage equal to **489% / 489% / 733%** of ATK each time.

skills.name: Flame Bomb
skills.description: Flame Sparrow flies for a period of time, then drops the firebomb from its claw at the enemy, dealing damage equal to **815% / 1222% / 1222%** of ATK.

skills.name: Flame Dive
skills.description: Flame Sparrow flies up a distance, then transforms into a phoenix and swoops down, dealing damage equal to **1351% / 1351% / 1351%** of ATK to the enemy.

FightPet_5.properties:
Inherits **4%** of the average value of the master's flame, frost, volt, and physical base attack values.
**1** module slot and **5** load.
advancements:
ATK inheritance increases to **6%**.
Flame Bomb's damage increases to **1,222%**.
**2** module slots and **8** load.

ATK inheritance increases to **8%**.
Each round of Flame Breath's damage increases to **733%**.
**3** module slots and **11** load.

ATK inheritance increases to **10%**.
Flame Dive's damage increases to **2,026%**.
**4** module slots and **15** load.

FightPet_6.name: Mi-a: Assistance
FightPet_6.description: The first encountered smart servant introduced by Shirli back in the Astra Shelter. A quiet one that is really good at taking care of people. A new smart servant combat module has been tested for it.

skills.name: Pop Cannon
skills.description: The drinks Mi-a carries not only can be used to feed Wanderers, but can also be used to refill energy bullets. The energy bullet can deal damage equal to **817% / 817% / 1225%** of ATK once it hits the enemy.

skills.name: Mi-a's Flare
skills.description: Mi-a gathers and charges the energy into a beam, dealing damage equal to **725% / 1088% / 1088%** of ATK once it hits the enemy.

skills.name: Chopping Board
skills.description: Mi-a generates a temporary chopping board that she learns from her daily cooking habit and uses it as an energy board to smash the enemy, dealing damage equal to **876% / 876% / 876%** of ATK to the enemy on hit and reducing their speed by 20% for 2 seconds.

FightPet_6.properties:
Inherits **4%** of the average value of the master's flame, frost, volt, and physical base attack values.
**1** module slot and **5** load.
advancements:
ATK inheritance increases to **6%**.
Mi-a's Flare's damage increases to **1,088%**.
**2** module slots and **8** load.

ATK inheritance increases to **8%**.
Pop Cannon's damage increases to **1,225%**.
**3** module slots and **11** load.

ATK inheritance increases to **10%**.
Chopping Board's damage increases to **1,314%**.
**4** module slots and **15** load.

FightPet_7.name: Zongyun
FightPet_7.description: A key product created through collaboration between Tianzhang Pavilion and Niners Heavy Machinery. Its main goal is said to be investing R&D toward the universalization of Madam Qinglong's partner pets.

skills.name: Dragon's Bead
skills.description: Zongyun focuses his power of lightning into an orb to attack enemies. Upon landing a hit, the orb releases a large amount of lightning, dealing damage equal to **1661% / 2491% / 2491%** of ATK to enemies in the area.

skills.name: Thundercaller
skills.description: Zongyun summons thunder to strike enemies ahead, dealing damage equal to **545% / 545% / 545%** of ATK 5 times.

skills.name: Rings of Thunder
skills.description: Zongyun creates two thunderous rings at its tail and tosses them at the enemies. Each ring deals damage equal to **1053% / 1053% / 1579%** of ATK.

FightPet_7.properties:
Inherits **4%** of the average value of the master's flame, frost, volt, and physical base attack values.
**1** module slot and **5** load.

ATK inheritance increases to **6%**.
Dragon's Bead's damage increases to **2,491%**.
**2** module slots and **8** load.

FightPet_8.name: Leia
FightPet_8.description:
"The 'Ultimate Weapon' series manufactured by Xiling Alliance Co. Ltd., model Î³1O-A. Xiling is the sole smart servant supplier to Hykros and is part of the Hykros-Domain 9 Smart Servant Committee. Founded by Ms. Shelly and Ms. Ling Qiao, two of this century's greatest female engineers, the company launched its first mass-produced smart servant in small batches within just a month of its founding. The company is mainly known for its research and production of smart servants, related products, and merchandise. As it moves into the future, the company is focusing more on vertical integration by forming deep connections with famous brands, such as Ultimate Warriors, and creating an original commercial complex. If you're interested in investing, please contact us at * * * - * * * *.
To meet new needs in combat, the Smart Servant Combat Module test has been conducted."

skills.name: Frost Talon
skills.description: Leia flings a series of Frost Talons, dealing 2 hits that each deal damage equal to **568% / 852% / 852%** of ATK. She then shoots out a stream of interlaced claw marks that deals damage equal to **568% / 852% / 852%** of ATK.

skills.name: Frozen Wings
skills.description: Leia slices through enemies with wings made of concentrated frost, dealing damage equal to **765% / 765% / 1147% **of ATK 2 times.

skills.name: Ice Cyclone
skills.description: Leia summons an Ice Cyclone at the enemy's position that lasts for 5 seconds, dealing damage equal to **447% / 447% / 447%** of ATK every 0.5 seconds.

FightPet_8.properties:
Inherits **4%** of the average value of the master's flame, frost, volt, and physical base attack values.
**1** module slot and **5** load.
Field energy absorption level +1.
advancements:
ATK inheritance increases to **6%**.
Each hit of Frost Talon's damage increases to **852%**.
**2** module slots and **8** load.

ATK inheritance increases to **8%**.
Each hit of Frozen Wing's damage increases to **1,147%**.
**3** module slots and **11** load.

ATK inheritance increases to **10%**.
Each hit of Ice Cyclone's damage increases to **670%**.
**4** module slots and **15** load.
Field energy absorption level +1.

FightPet_9.name: Aurawolf
FightPet_9.description: A next-generation smart servant developed by Ling Qiao, based on the legends of Domain 9. Its combat module has been tested in response to new combat requirements.

skills.name: Charged Pulse Cannon
skills.description: Aurawolf opens its mouth, revealing a beam cannon within. After charging up, it fires a powerful energy beam, dealing damage equal to **1012% / 1518% / 1518%** of ATK to enemies hit.

skills.name: Frenzied Claws
skills.description: Aurawolf rapidly swings its claws, delivering a total of six swipes in a short period of time, each swipe dealing damage equal to **214% / 214% / 214%** of ATK. After a brief charge, it delivers two extra powerful forward swipes, each dealing damage equal to **214% / 214% / 214%** of ATK to enemies hit.

skills.name: Triple Swipe
skills.description: Aurawolf swings its claws and delivers two forward swipes, each dealing damage equal to **347% / 347% / 520%** of ATK. Then it uses its rear thrusters to spin forward, striking enemies with its tail and simultaneously firing an energy blade, dealing damage equal to **347% / 347% / 520%** and **347% / 347% / 520%** of ATK respectively.

FightPet_9.properties:
Inherits **4%** of the average value of the master's flame, frost, volt, and physical base attack values.
**1** module slot and **5** load.
advancements:
ATK inheritance increases to **6%**.
Damage of the Charged Pulse Cannon is increased to **1,518%**.
**2** module slots and **8** load.

ATK inheritance increases to **8%**.
Each stage of the Triple Swipe's damage is increased to **520%**.
**3** module slots and **11** load.

ATK inheritance increases to **10%**.
The damage of the first 6 hits of Frenzied Claws is increased to **321%** and the last 2 hits' are increased to **618%**.
**4** module slots and **15** load.

FightPet_10.name: Snowy
FightPet_10.description: A tiger-themed smart servant that leaves ice crystals in her path. The combat module has been tested in response to new combat requirements.

skills.name: Frost Spikes
skills.description: Snowy claps her hands, gathering six ice spikes around her then swings her hands, launching the ice spikes in two batches, with each spike dealing damage equal to **242% / 242% / 363%** of ATK to the enemy hit.

skills.name: Extreme Cold
skills.description: Snowy flies upward, creating an ice cone at the enemy's location, dealing damage equal to **995% / 995% / 995%** of ATK. The ice cone then shatters, dealing damage equal to **995% / 995% / 995%** of ATK.

skills.name: Leave Snowy Alone!
skills.description: Snowy raises her hands, launching a massive ice sphere above her head to smash down on enemies, dealing damage equal to **1273% / 1909% / 1909%** of ATK.

FightPet_10.properties:
Inherits **4%** of the average value of the master's flame, frost, volt, and physical base attack values.
**1** module slot and **5** load.
advancements:
ATK inheritance increases to **6%**.
Leave Snowy Alone!'s damage increases to **1,909%**.
**2** module slots and **8** load.

ATK inheritance increases to **8%**.
Each round of Frost Spike's damage increases to **363%**.
**3** module slots and **11** load.

ATK inheritance increases to **10%**.
Each round of Extreme Cold's damage increases to **1,492%**.
**4** module slots and **15** load.

material.name: Sky Crystal
material.description: A peculiar ore from Domain 9. Its crystal-clear appearance sparkles brightly in the sunlight.

material.name: Dark Essence
material.description: A crystal formed on the surface from leaking leyline energy. Affected by the environment, it produces a lattice that tends to reflect more purple light, from whence it gets its name. It is a low-energy source.

material.name: Ginger Essence
material.description: A crystal formed through energy leaking to the surface from leylines. Easily affected by the environment, these produce a lattice that reflects more yellow light, from whence it gets its name. It is a high-energy source.

material.name: Black Crow's Feather
material.description: The whistling from it cutting through the wind seems audible as you gaze upon it.

material.name: Zhuyan Scale Mail
material.description: The patterns on the scale mail make it obvious that it was no ordinary civilization behind its creation.

material.name: Taotie Essence Pellet
material.description: The attached energy body is said to have formed from the residual energy of the eaten organism.

material.name: Graystone
material.description: A peculiar ore from Domain 9. An essential material used in the production of certain alloy devices.

material.name: Red Ore
material.description: A peculiar ore from Domain 9. Its bright crimson hue is eerily reminiscent of blood.

material.name: Umbra Rock
material.description: A peculiar ore from Domain 9. Its unusual texture grants it a strange color.

material.name: Standard Lamellar Armor
material.description: A small, standard-style lamellar armor that offers pretty good defensive performance.

material.name: Weapon License
material.description: A key system that grants permission to use weapons.

FightPet_11.name: Pen Pen
FightPet_11.description: Misato's pet, usually housed in a custom freezer in Misato Katsuragi's apartment. It enjoys hot baths and can cleverly press buttons with its wingtips. Besides adopting human habits of sleeping and bathing, it even enjoys reading newspapers. However, it somehow got into the fridge when Shinji and others moved into the Star Apartments in Mirroria.

skills.name: Smoke Impact
skills.description: Pen Pen boosts its thruster, charges toward an enemy, and releases a smokescreen upon arrival, dealing damage equal to **351% / 526% / 526%** of ATK to enemies caught in the smokescreen every second and slowing them.

skills.name: Beer Can Barrage
skills.description: Pen Pen throws a barrage of beer cans ahead, each dealing damage equal to **412% / 412% / 618%** of ATK to enemies nearby upon explosion.

skills.name: Inspiration of Pen Pen
skills.description: Pen Pen flaps its wings gently to inspire the Wanderer it follows, restoring HP equal to **220% / 220% / 220%** of ATK for the inspired Wanderer.

FightPet_11.properties:
Inherits **4%** of the average value of the master's flame, frost, volt, and physical base attack values.
**1** module slot and **5** load.
advancements:
ATK inheritance increases to **6%**.
Each round of released smokescreen's damage increases to **526%**.
**2** module slots and **8** load.

ATK inheritance increases to **8%**.
Each round of beer can's damage increases to **618%**.
**2** module slots and **8** load.

ATK inheritance increases to **10%**.
Heal roar's healing capability increases to **330%**.
**4** module slots and **15** load.

material.name: Pet Control Module
material.description: The control module used to upgrade Pen Pen's jetpack. Its control system is more suitable for Pen Pen.
